nodes.text: Balderdash was a city on the planet of Adarlon. The town was the origin of a HoloNet News article related to the controversy surrounding the casting of Harlan Ottekvar as Lord Baltharog in the holofilm adaptation of Quest for Quasar being made by Myris Pictures in 22 BBY.

Balderdash was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 51. The article that referenced the city, titled "Quest for Quasar Fans Don't Like Ottekvar," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
